name: Open source code from Dr Paul Brewer and Economic & Financial Technology Consulting LLC
body:
## Welcome

This page exists to help people looking for open source software find what they need from me, quickly, and understand how the various libraries are related. 

## Economics 

### Agent-based Market Simulation 

These projects are libraries that can be assembled to form an agent-based market simulator with robot traders.  

* market-engine
* market-example-contingent
* market-agents

An example simulator, supporting one market, built atop this code is at:

* single-market-robot-simulator

And a web front end is at

* robot-trading-webapp

and runs at http://drpaulbrewer.github.io/robot-trading-webapp

### Game Theory Matrix-Game Prototype in MeteorJS for Human Subject Experiments

###HAMP Loan Modification

* Unofficial HAMP Calculator

* Correlation of HAMP Loan Application Outcomes and the 2008 Presidential Vote

## Amateur-Radio Hobbyist code

* satchat Ham Radio and Weather Satellite tracker with chat room in MeteorJS
* cqwx NOAA APT Weather Satellite signal decoder written in python
* rtlsdr-automated-wxsat-capture Automation for recording and processing signals from an RTLSDR device in Linux
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
